KleenGuard V30 Nemesis is manufactered by Kimberly-Clark Professional, a trusted brand in Safety Glasses.
product_description: KleenGuard™ Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) enables rather than inhibits – allowing for maximum productivity and safety for you and your employees. Giving your employees what they need to do their job safely and effectively is a top priority of any business owner. KleenGuard™ Nemesis Safety Eyewear's stylish good looks and durable, lightweight construction are just some of the reasons why millions of people wear them for protection both at work and at home. Nemesis Safety Glasses have polycarbonate lenses that provide 99.9% UVA/ UVB/UVC protection to help prevent eye damage like cataracts, retinal damage, and other conditions that can cause temporary vision loss., The wraparound frame has a base curve of 8 that extends the range of peripheral protection, as well as soft touch temples for comfort. The Nemesis safety glasses have a patented nose piece designed to be extremely flexible, to channel sweat away from the eyes, and to help prevent slippage down the nose – all for long-term comfort. Each pair of KleenGuard™ Nemesis safety glasses come with a neck cord for securing them, so that the glasses are ready to protect at a moment's notice. The safety eyewear is manufactured to comply with the ANSI / ISEA Z87.1+ standard for personal eye protection. Both men and women will find these stylish glasses to be comfortable and functional for construction, manufacturing, gun shooting / shooting range, and a host of other industries. Remember: comfort and style drive compliance, so it pays to provide comfortable designer glasses that your staff will be proud to wear. Making the right Personal Protection choice is difficult. Perform with distinction with KleenGuard™ Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).

name: NoCry Anti-Fog Safety Sunglasses for Men with Scratch Resistant Lenses — Tinted Safety Glasses for Construction with 100% UV Protection — ANSI Z87.1 Work Sunglasses with Adjustable Temples & Nose Pad
short_description: SAY GOODBYE TO FOGGY LENSES — Discover crystal-clear vision with these work safety glasses tinted. They're 5X more fog-resistant and 2X more scratch-resistant than your average pair of z87 safety glasses, so you can work with confidence without discomfort or distractions.

FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE FOR YOUR COMFORT — Adjust the length and angle of your ANSI z87 sunglasses for men construction to achieve the perfect fit. The soft, adjustable nose pad reduces pressure, while the anti-slip rubber tips keep your mens safety sunglasses securely in place all day long.

100% UV SHIELDING — Shield your eyes from harmful UV rays while working outdoors. With 100% UV protection, these work sunglasses for men construction block 85% of light. This reduces visual fatigue, and provides glare protection whether you're doing yard work or tackling a DIY project under the sun.

SUPERIOR PROTECTION — Tackle any task with confidence with these safety glasses sunglasses. The ANSI Z87.1 certified lenses are built to protect your eyes from impacts on the job. The wraparound design ensures full coverage, shielding your eyes from the sun, wind, and debris.

BUILT TO LAST — Made with a tough, lightweight frame and an anti-scratch finish, these construction sunglasses are built to last. And for your peace of mind, these work glasses for men safety are backed by a lifetime warranty. If you experience any issues or these dark safety glasses for men aren’t what you were looking for, reach out, and we’ll be happy to help you.

name: Magid Glove & Safety Anti-Fog Polycarbonate Safety Glasses, 1 Pair, Y50
short_description: Classic Styling: The black-frame safety glasses have a classic style that is comfortable to wear and looks like traditional glasses, encouraging worker compliance
Side Shields: Clear shields attached to the sides of the safety glasses offer additional protection against splash sand debris; Side shields are permanent and cannot be removed
Wiper Case: Glasses are sold with a wiper case for easy care; Wiper case makes it easy to keep glasses clean and smudge-free so they’re always ready for use
Polycarbonate Lenses: Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses meet ANSI Z87.1 2015 high impact standards and are incredibly durable; Amber lenses won’t distort colors
Lightweight Nylon frame: Safety glasses are made with a lightweight nylon frame that is more comfortable to wear than other frame types; Lightweight for all-day comfort
product_description: For workers who want style and protection with features that offer all-day comfort, choose MAGID® Gemstone Y50 Classic Black Frame Safety Glasses. The lightweight nylon safety glasses feature permanent side shields for superior protection against splashes, debris, and other hazards, no matter which angle they come from. The clear side shields won’t hinder visibility, but provide an added layer of safety for critical tasks. The clear side shields are designed to preserve peripheral vision without distracting the wearer, so your eye protection will never get in the way of your work. The safety glasses deliver excellent impact protection in an iconic design that workers will want to wear. The scratch-resistant, wraparound safety glasses meet ANSI Z87.1 high impact standards and offer UV protection in one package. An anti-fog coating completes the design and keeps the lenses clear even under pressure, so you can stay safe and stay on task. Anti-Fog Coating: Yes Frame Color: Black Frame Style: Standard Hard Coating: Yes Lens Color: Amber Standard: ANSI Z87.1 2015 High Impact Temple Style: Integrated Side Shields UV Protection: Yes. • Black nylon frame • Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses • Wiper case included Soft grey temple pads Modern style
